items.content_html: Hello the name is Mudit. I am using MERN stack for this assignment as this application with it's lightweight operations and simplicity requirements can be best created using an express backend. Mongo DB database is created and utilized because of the dynamic nature of posts and the type of data being unstructured.
items.title: Mudit2003/cloudsek-assignment: Hello the name is Mudit. I am using MERN stack for this assignment as this application with it's lightweight operations and simplicity requirements can be best created using an express backend. Mongo DB database is created and utilized because of the dynamic nature of posts and the type of data being unstructured.

items.content_html: A lightweight reactive store library that provides a powerful reactivity system for managing state, compatible with any UI framework, including, Solid.js, and Preact Signals.

items.content_html: tansu is a lightweight, push-based state management library. It borrows the ideas and APIs originally designed and implemented by Svelte stores.

items.content_html: easyAuditLogger is a lightweight and easy-to-use module designed to simplify the process of capturing and logging audit events in your Discord bot. Whether you're tracking role changes, message deletions, or user updates, easyAuditLogger handles it smoothly.
items.title: Tomtom-Skywalker/easyauditlogger: easyAuditLogger is a lightweight and easy-to-use module designed to simplify the process of capturing and logging audit events in your Discord bot. Whether you're tracking role changes, message deletions, or user updates, easyAuditLogger handles it smoothly.

items.title: metebykl/spectra: Fast, lightweight and fully typesafe web framework

items.content_html: observerly's lightweight, zero-dependency, type safe astrometry library written in TypeScript. This library can be used to ascertain to positions of the Sun, Moon and the planets, as well as ascertain transit times for any astronomical object.
items.title: observerly/astrometry: observerly's lightweight, zero-dependency, type safe astrometry library written in TypeScript. This library can be used to ascertain to positions of the Sun, Moon and the planets, as well as ascertain transit times for any astronomical object.

items.content_html: CountdownTimer is a lightweight, customizable JavaScript library that enables you to create countdown timers effortlessly. Ideal for web applications, events, or any time-based functionality.
